name: The Short Scientist and The Robot Factory
name_original: The Short Scientist and The Robot Factory
description:
The Short Scientist and The Robot Factory is a wacky rougelike with turn-based action combat (think Paper Mario and Undertale)!

- rougelike - randomly generated levels, game resets when you die
- 7 enemies (WOW!)
- OVER 3 AREAS (there is 4)
- cutscenes, featuring a story that might tug on your heartstrings (if you are an incredibly emotional person)
- humour!
- surprisingly good music from an entirely unqualified  and inexperienced musician
- unique combat that I can GUARANTEE you've never seen before (or your money back!)

Thanks for looking at my game page!
- Game by Kade Hennessy
- Music by Rhys Hennessy
- Made in pygame
